goal.ch: The purpose of this course is to understand astrophysics in different situations at a fairly advanced level from a unified perspective.
goal.en: The purpose of this course is to understand astrophysics in different situations at a fairly advanced level from a unified perspective.

outline.ch:
1. Introduction and radiative transfer
2. Basic electromagnetism
3. Relativity
4: Continuum emission mechanisms: free-free emission, synchrotron radiation, inverse Compton emission
5. Spectral line analysis
6. Gas  dynamics
7. Viscous and Inviscid flow
8. Accretion and accretion disk
9. Shock

flexDiscription.ch:
The final two weeks will be a self-learning project.
Students are expected to be able to apply 
the astrophysics they have learned in the semester to 
different astrophysical phenomena/environments of 
their own selection.
